text: The Original Six is a well-known term for the group of six teams that composed the National Hockey League (NHL) for the 25 seasons between the 1942-43 NHL season and the 1967 NHL Expansion. ==The teams== * Montreal Canadiens (founded 1909; charter member of the NHL in 1917) * Toronto Maple Leafs (original Toronto franchise was charter member of the NHL in 1917; renamed Maple Leafs in 1927) * Boston Bruins (founded 1924) * New York Rangers (founded 1925) * Detroit Red Wings (founded 1926) * Chicago Blackhawks (founded 1926, known as the "Black Hawks" throughout the period) * Category:Montreal Canadiens Category:Toronto Maple Leafs Category:Boston Bruins Category:New York Rangers Category:Detroit Red Wings Category:Chicago Blackhawks
title: Original Six
